    Our Vision

    Museum of Northern California Art

    We are a vehicle for Chico and northern California communities to experience and create art for the sake of enjoyment, expression, social cohesion, innovation and communication.

    About Us

    Permanent Collections

    Reed Applegate & Maria Alquilar

    Our permanent exhibitions are periodically on display, showcasing a variety of work by artists from Northern California.

    Calls For Art

    Submit Your Artwork

    Are you interested in showing your artwork? Throughout the year we gather submissions for select exhibitions.

    Call for Art

    Join Us

    Members of monca get exclusive benefits and easy access to all of our events. We have a variety of memberships available for individuals, families and businesses.

    Become a Member

    monca's Legacy Project

    We need your support for the next phase of monca! Revitalizing the iconic Memorial Hall Stage and so much more.

    Support The Museum

    monca only exists with help from our community. Your support strengthens art education in Chico and throughout Northern California.
